nodes.text: Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars: Battles of the Clone Wars
Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars: Battles of the Clone Wars is a sticker book that was published by Dorling Kindersley and released on August 7, 2013.

There is a growing darkness in the galaxy that could soon lead to war. The Jedi must try to keep the peace, but is it too late? Look inside the all new Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars: Battles of the Clone Wars to find out!

Enter the action-packed world of Star Wars, meet the fascinating characters, and learn all about their vehicles and weapons. With over 1,000 easy-peel, reusaeble stickers, children of all ages can re-create their favorite scenes from a galaxy far, far away.
